name.baseName: Gas Purification ; Semi-coke (lang char) ; Raw material coal (low rank coal) ; Semi-coke (lang char) ; All sizes; NESPS2
煤气净化 ; 半焦（兰炭） ; 原料煤（低阶煤） ; 半焦（兰炭） ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen, organic boundisPretreatment + biochemical treatment + post-treatment + advenced treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management96，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater terminal treatment facilities (hours) / normal production time (hours)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen, organic boundisPretreatment + biochemical treatment + post-treatment + advenced treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management96，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater terminal treatment facilities (hours) / normal production time (hours)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 本数据集描述了使用原料煤（低阶煤）加工的半焦（兰炭）气体净化工业过程。所述的管道末端管理技术用于处理和减少包括化学需氧量、氨氮、石油相关废物、苯酚、氰化物、总磷和有机结合氮在内的各种污染物。所述的处理流程包括前处理、生化处理、后处理和高级处理，实现了高技术效率的污染物管理。这样的净化过程适用于所有规模的气体净化设施，并且在生产半焦和需要环境污染物控制的行业中至关重要。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码25,四级代码2521文件，在完整版文件中第2881页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution cyanideisPretreatment + biochemical treatment + post-treatment + advenced treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater terminal treatment facilities (hours) / normal production time (hours)
污染物指标氰化物的末端治理技术是预处理+生化处理+后处理+深度处理，其效率为99，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氰化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氰化物

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPretreatment + biochemical treatment + post-treatment + advenced treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99.7
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是预处理+生化处理+后处理+深度处理，其效率为99.7，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为化学需氧量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPretreatment + biochemical treatment + post-treatment + advenced treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management96，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater terminal treatment facilities (hours) / normal production time (hours)
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是预处理+生化处理+后处理+深度处理，其效率为96，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总磷
源文件中描述为为半焦（兰炭），此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为化学需氧量
